title: verify_yahoo_watchlist_api_real_time_data_fetch
description: Test the Yahoo Watchlist API to ensure it correctly fetches and maps real-time stock data from the market_tickers table specifically for the EGX watchlist, verifying data accuracy and response format.

title: validate_stock_profile_and_history_api_data_accuracy
description: Test the Stock Profile & History API to verify it provides accurate and complete company profiles from market_tickers and historical OHLC data from ohlc_data, ensuring data consistency and correctness.

title: test_deep_screener_api_multi_factor_filtering
description: Test the Deep Screener API to confirm it correctly applies multi-factor filters such as sector, market capitalization, and valuation metrics, returning consistent and expected stock results based on input criteria.

title: validate_mutual_funds_api_nav_and_sector_data
description: Test the Mutual Funds API to ensure it accurately tracks NAVs, returns, and sector allocations for mutual funds, reflecting up-to-date data and correct classifications.

title: test_database_integration_layer_async_access
description: Test the asynchronous database integration layer using Supabase and secondary connection pools to verify stable and efficient database access without blocking, ensuring data integrity and performance.
